General.Name: Pharmasimple SA
General.Description: Pharmasimple SA operates a Website for medicines, cosmetics, and food supplements in Belgium and France. It offers face products comprising accessories, creams, cleansers, scrubs, masks, supplements, tanners, and other care products; body and hair, makeup, solar, and products; waters and perfumes; food supplements; health accessories, bandages, devices, first-aid, and pain/ache, as well as diet products; and masks, thermometers, glover, air purifiers, and home and hand hygiene products. The company also provides toilet, and mom and baby care; sliming and sports products; daily, oral, and organic hygiene products; and aromatherapy, bach flowers, homeopathy, apitherapy, herbalism, phytotherapy, gemmotherapy, floral elixirs, balneotherapy, light therapy, lithotherapy, and magnetotherapy medicines; as well as male, animals, and organic and natural products. Pharmasimple SA was founded in 2010 and is based in Houdeng-Goegnies, Belgium.
